House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07920
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING THE THIRD SUNDAY OF NOVEMBER OF EVERY YEAR AS THE NATIONAL DAY OF REMEMBRANCE FOR ROAD CRASH VICTIMS, SURVIVORS, AND THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES
ABSTRACT : Aims to raise people’s awareness on the causes, consequences, and cost of road deaths and injuries by declaring 3rd Sunday of November a day of remembrance.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C.
